Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes the Long Island transportation account
Summary: Establishes the Long Island transportation account within the New York city transportation assistance fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง1270-i, Pub Auth L; amd ยง1299-H, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the Long Island transportation account
